alert.note: Alert for Allegheny; Beaver; Fayette; Washington; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 5:33PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...COLUMBIANA... SOUTHERN BEAVER...CENTRAL WASHINGTON...CENTRAL ALLEGHENY... SOUTHWESTERN WESTMORELAND...NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 533 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from Salem to Perryopolis. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Pittsburgh, Mount Lebanon, Bethel Park, Moon Township, McMurray, Washington, Salem, East Liverpool, Uniontown, Aliquippa, Canonsburg, Connellsville, Columbiana, East Palestine, Wellsville, Gastonville, West Mifflin, Baldwin, Upper St. Clair, and Scott Township. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 18 and 52. Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 34 and 37, and between mile markers 39 and 66. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 40 and 69. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. A winter weather advisory is in effect for the area. Please monitor local media outlets and the national weather service for further statements. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
